definitions: a light two-wheeled open motor vehicle on which the driver sits over an enclosed engine with legs together and feet resting on a floorboard.
shortDefinitions: light two-wheeled open motor vehicle on which driver sits over enclosed engine with their legs together and their feet resting on floorboard

definitions: any small, light, vehicle able to travel quickly across water, ice, or snow
shortDefinitions: any small, light, vehicle able to travel quickly across water or snow

definitions: a vehicle typically ridden as a recreation, consisting of a footboard mounted on two wheels and a long steering handle, propelled by resting one foot on the footboard and pushing the other against the ground.
shortDefinitions: child's toy consisting of footboard mounted on two wheels and long steering handle, propelled by resting one foot on footboard and pushing other against ground

definitions: travel or ride on a scooter

examples.text: scootering is the most economical and practical form of transportation
